It seems that your online payment encountered difficulties, unfortunately. These reasons may be the cause:


  • Entering incorrect bank details.
  • Payment limit exceeded.
  • Technical problem on the place of connection to the Internet.

Please notify that our online payment stay fully secured even if your payment fails. Your financial information remains confidential and fully protected.


If you wish to try again, please find back your cart below. For assistance, please contact us on contact@monbento.com.
